items.title: Charges against suspect upgraded as Trump vows immigration policy changes
items.description: The National Guard shooting suspect now faces a charge of murder in the first degree, following the death of Spec. Sarah Beckstrom.

items.title: Trump’s flexible diplomacy drives new Ukraine peace push — and fresh turmoil
items.description: The president’s improvisatory approach is unsettling Kyiv and its allies. Backers say Trump’s style might win results where others have failed.
